title.newValue: Microsoft Purview | eDiscovery (Premium) List usability enhancements (U.S government clouds)

description.newValue:
Various UX and workflow enhancements including the ability to mark an eDiscovery (Premium) case as favorite, user filter/group/sort/search persistence on various list pages (such as cases list), and quickly access common collection operations (such as edit collection query, rerun estimate, and commit collection).
GA date: October CY2022
